attributes.action: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[disabled]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister to agree his Labour Government will look into and stop disabled discrimination, by his own Labour Government, equally by all public and private organisations, against disabled people, who require the use of all approved Ethnic / Disabled Accessible Format/language System's (E/DAFS's) using Ethnic / Disabled Assistive Technology System's (E/DATS's). Also where necessary the British Government will take official and/or legal action against either public and/or private organisations, who are guilty of ethnic and/or disabled discrimination, over refusing to meet ethnic and disabled discrimination laws, with regards their own legal duties to provide all their own official paperwork, all types of communication’s and/or websites, in all approved DAFS's and using all approved DATS's to provide this too.
attributes.creator_name: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[disabled]

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
